SHIPS.mainweapon: 200MM Augled Tech Stricker(triple shot) medium range Cannon
SHIPS.secondaryweapon: Deep-Pit Medium-close range anti-BattleShip Swarm penetration Missile
SHIPS.desc: Telaran Empire designed Heavy Assualt Cruiser, 12000 Ton, max-speed: 300km/hour, acceleration:60km/s, not very fast or agile, but relatively hardened, firepower is stronger than normal crusier.

SHIPS.secondaryweapon: 140MM Arkorove Tech Medium range Plasma Cannon
SHIPS.assitantweapon: SwordFish light-weight fast medium range detonate Missile
SHIPS.desc: Arkorove Design Buearu's steady work, VanGuard class Destroyer is a Medium-long range bombardment fire plantform, agile, fast and deadly

SHIPS.mainweapon: 380MM Torrance Empire Made Long Range Cannon
SHIPS.secondaryweapon: True-Sight Torrance Empire Made Long Range All-Purpose Missile
SHIPS.desc: Torrance Empire Designed Cleaven Class BC is an extrodinary full range Strick force not easily reconed with. As normal BC, Cleaven class is fast as a Cruiser and Can project firepower as an BattleShip. As all other BC, Cleaven Class made a sacrifice on the Defence as well. 52000 Ton Fully Loaded, Max-speed: 270km/hour, acceleration: 40km/s

WEAPONS.name: 200MM Augled Tech Stricker(triple shot) medium range Cannon
WEAPONS.desc: Each firing sequence will have 3 conservertive shots, then followed a longtime reloading, Deadly for it's bursting firepower

WEAPONS.name: Deep-Pit Medium-close range anti-BattleShip Swarm penetration Missile
WEAPONS.desc: Deep-Pit Medium-close Missiles are medium range light-weight ship crap maker...

WEAPONS.name: Deep-Pit Medium-long range MultiFunctional Missile
WEAPONS.desc: Deep-Pit Medium-long Missiles are medium range light multiFunctional weaponary mainly to weaken the enemy from far away...

WEAPONS.name: 120MM Arkorove Tech medium range Railgun
WEAPONS.desc: Arkorove Tech Railgun mainly concentrated on fire range and constant supportive power but lacks the decisive firewpower

WEAPONS.name: 140MM Arkorove Tech Medium range Plasma Cannon
WEAPONS.desc: Arkorove Tech Plasma Cannon is a extrodinary weaponary against armor, but slow charging speed and reload speed limited it's firepower

WEAPONS.name: SwordFish light-weight fast medium range detonate Missile
WEAPONS.desc: SwordFish light-weight Detonate Missile is a very accurate weapon against small and fast adverseries, it's firepower is strong enough for those light-weight ships, although this weapon lacks armor-piercing abilities, but normally their targets doesn't have any

WEAPONS.name: 380MM Torrance Empire Made Long Range Cannon
WEAPONS.desc: Torrance Empire Made 380MM Long range Cannon is an Extrodinary full range Weaponary against any kind of adversary.

WEAPONS.name: True-Sight Torrance Empire Made Long Range All-Purpose Missile
WEAPONS.desc: Torrance Empire Made Long range All-Purpose Missile is an universal Missile can be used against any target from far away.

WEAPONS.name: Torrance Empire Made SpaceCraft Ejector
WEAPONS.desc: Torrance Empire Made Long range All-Purpose Missile is an universal Missile can be used against any target from far away.
